author: wr212
body:
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)
Кожні чотири роки є група гравців, які не виняток. Кубок світу є найкращим місцем, щоб показати свою майстерність гравця, щоб отримати кращий контракт з їх поточної командою, щоб привернути увагу до HeadHunter або просто підняти ціни на ринку, але це подія, безумовно, кращий шанс для гравців, щоб виділитися. серед натовпу.
Одна річ, щоб бути кращим гравцем в національній лізі, в якій налічується понад 30 ігор в рік, щоб отримати хорошу форму, знайти кращий рівень, розуміння ваших товаришів по команді і повністю зрозуміти команду геймплей. Це ще одна річ, яка повністю відрізняється від грати в турнірі, де у вас є тільки 3 гри, щоб зробити їх краще, finjo Mojo вас і викластися бій, щоб досягти наступного раунду, де поганий день може означати того, щоб повернутися додому, замість вийшов на сцену нокауту.

У Кубку світу, гравці стикаються з жорстким випробуванням в їхньому житті, де всі свої таланти і навички випробуваного, але те, що відрізняє хороших гравців від великих гравців менталітет і ставлення до гри, в певному напрямку. ситуацій, коли вони стикаються з негативними цінностями ... У світі чаші розуму так само важливо, як і тіло, тому ми вирішили навести список гравців, які, на нашу думку, мають тіло і розум, які дозволять їм керувати ними. команда до перемоги. Покладіться на своїх товаришів по команді, виконання команди дуже залежить від продуктивності гравця.

<center>![1. Mohamed Salah.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZMgpwTEqWtWcA3piSggYAH2mLYRarMchenhiqopSN5yq/1.%20Mohamed%20Salah.jpg)</center>

author: anak123
body:
<center>![piala dunia.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVFjQ7hnd4mpn4k4nL9P5H5aJxvLYvF9quAvyVJUmmkxU/piala%20dunia.jpg)</center>
<center>[](https://pialadunia.tempo.co/read/1051773/kisah-piala-dunia-pertama-1930-sejarah-bermula-di-montevideo)</center>
The 32 best teams in the world will compete for the best in the 2018 World Cup, to be held in Russia from 14 June to 15 July. It will be the 21st edition of the world's biggest football competition.World Cup history has stretched long, since 1930. At that time football has been contested at the Olympics since 1920 and won by Belgium. Uruguay then won the next two editions, namely in 1924 and 1928.
The success of the Olympic football tournament spurred the hope of world football's governing body (FlFA) to be able to hold its own world championship. The questionnaire is then sent to the members association, asking if they agree to organize the tournament.A special committee was formed for election purposes. FIFA President Jules Rimet became the driving force. He is assisted by the tireless secretary general, Henri Delaunay.The FIFA Congress in Amsterdam on May 28, 1928 finally decided to organize a world championship organized by FIFA. Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Spain and Sweden volunteered to host.
Uruguay finally elected. The country is considered eligible to host the Olympic champion twice and is currently celebrating the 100th anniversary of independence. Uruguay is also willing to bear all costs, including travel and accommodation from participating teams.The first World Cup was full of thorns and thorns. Europe is in the midst of an economic crisis. Participating countries only involve long sea travel, many clubs also object to releasing their best players for two months.
As a result, many countries decide to cancel. Rimet also has to do a lot of maneuvers to make sure there are at least four European teams - France, Belgium, Romania, and Yugoslavia - still performing.Thirteen teams (seven from South America, four from Europe, and two from North America) participated in the tournament. The first World Cup opened at the new Estadio Centenario in Montevideo on July 18, 1930. The tournament was held in three cities.
The participating teams were then divided into four groups, with the winners from each group progressing to the semi-finals. The first two World Cup matches took place simultaneously, and were won by France and the United States, which beat Mexico 4-1 and Belgium 3-0.France's Lucien Laurent scored the first goal in World Cup history. While American goalkeeper Jimmy Douglas recorded the first clean sheet (not conceded) in the tournament.
Argentina, Uruguay, the United States and Yugoslavia won their respective groups and managed to qualify for the semi-finals. In the final, Uruguay meet Argentina. The favored Uruguayan host at the start finally won with a 4-2 win. The last match in Centenario, Montevideo, witnessed 93 thousand.
The first World Cup was a success, but Uruguay were disappointed as there were only four European teams participating. Anger in Montevideo was so great that four years later, when Italy hosted, Uruguay became the first and only defending champion to refuse to defend the title.In 1930 World Cup Guillermo Stabile from Argentina was the top scorer, with a collection of 8 goals. In 18 games it created a total of 70 goals. While the total audience reached 590 thousand or an average of 32 thousand per game.

<center>![b10.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbSt6kktnqnVHrks8fn3b4jL7XbaDmf9sd22QFcEirPuE/b10.jpg)</center>

Есть более 1200 записей от 1200 различных людей из Стемиана, и у вас есть еще одна неделя, чтобы представить свои записи!
-----------------------------------------------

Это может быть конкурс с большим количеством участников истории Стемита ... насколько это здорово?
-------------------------------------------------
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)

Предыдущее сообщение было оплачено и больше не может быть выкуплено. Потому что мы хотим, чтобы EVERYONE в Steemit присоединился к этому конкурсу, и одно из правил присоединиться к кубку @blocktrades - выкупить объявление, мы решили сделать новое объявление.
ЕСЛИ ВЫ ХОТИТЕ ПРИСОЕДИНЯТЬСЯ НА ЭТОТ КОНКУРС, ВЫ НЕ ДОЛЖНЫ ПРИНИМАТЬ ПРЕДЫДУЩИЙ ПОЧТА, ВЫ МОЖЕТЕ ПРОИЗВОДИТЬ ЭТО ОДИН.

@blocktrades любит спонсировать проекты взаимодействия с сообществом этого типа, и @anomadsoul & @acidyo знают, что многие из Steemian любят эту игру, поэтому мы решили провести этот грандиозный турнир по футболу.

Вам не обязательно быть профессиональным аналитиком игры, ваша сборная не должна участвовать, вам не нужно много знать о футболе, чтобы присоединиться ...

Все, что вам нужно сделать, это написать сообщение, набирающее каждого победителя матча, и Стемеан, который делает больше очков, выигрывает.

Так просто, как
Привет @anomadsoul, я хочу часть 2000 SBD, как я могу присоединиться?
Это легко: в мировом кубке есть два этапа: Stage Stage и Stage Knockout.

Для этого этапа группового этапа кубка @blocktrades все, что вам нужно сделать, это создать сообщение с предсказаниями матча в каждой из следующих игр. Имена команд должны быть на английском языке:
Вы должны сделать сообщение с вашим прогнозом. В этом посте вы должны использовать W (чтобы выиграть), L (проиграть) и T (для привязки) в каждой игре.

ВЫ ДОЛЖНЫ ИСПОЛЬЗОВАТЬ ЭТОТ ШАБЛОН, ЧТОБЫ ПРИСОЕДИНЯТЬСЯ К КОНКУРУ. ЩЕЛКНИТЕ ЗДЕСЬ, ЧТОБЫ ПОЛУЧИТЬ ШАБЛОН
Эй, @anomadsoul, есть правило?

Да, есть несколько простых правил:
ПРАВИЛА
1 - Название вашего сообщения должно быть: The @blocktrades World Cup | Мой выбор

2 - В вашем сообщении вы должны указать ссылку на это объявление.

3 - Используйте формат, указанный в ссылке выше, чтобы мы могли организовать каждую запись.

4- Используйте теги blocktradesworldcup и теги mypicks

5 - Восстановить сообщение. Мы хотим иметь сотни записей.

6 - После создания сообщения вы не можете его редактировать. Поэтому, пожалуйста, подумайте о своем выборе тщательно перед публикацией.

7 - Минимальная репутация для участия - 40. Это делается для того, чтобы не присоединяться к ботам.}

8 - Вы можете подать заявку до 14 июня 2018 года в 00:01, часовой пояс UTC.

Печать: для каждого правильного пикапа, который вы делаете на групповом этапе, вам будет присвоен один (1) балл. В конце кубка приз будет разделен между главными голами состязателей. Предполагаемое количество участников войны будет зависеть от количества записей, которые мы получаем.
Привет @blocktrades, а как насчет второго этапа Кубка, нокаутом?

Групповой этап завершился 28 июня (русское время) и этап нокаута начинается 30 июня. Поэтому после 28 июня мы объявим об этом аккаунте, чтобы вы знали, как работает этап нокаута.

Каждый человек может участвовать в обоих этапах, и победитель будет определяться количеством баллов с обеих этапов.
Попробуйте и пусть начнутся предсказания!

Это конкурс спонсоров на @blocktrades, если вам нравится, что он делает, проголосуйте за @blocktrades в качестве свидетеля [здесь](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

Это конкурс @acidyo & @anomadsoul, проголосовавший за @ ocd-witness в качестве свидетеля [здесь](https://steemit.com/wwitnesses)

body:
![b4.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcM9bBkWqXcWxXnKHhUr6kzcnQwhN7U58TtNb5ByRUf6A/b4.png)

The World Cup is the largest international football event in the world. The tournament is held every four years and is hosted by FIFA as the world's tallest footballing body. The FIFA World Cup has the official name of the FIFA World Cup. Each country participates through the qualification stage to the final to win the world championship trophy. But this tournament has a long history of becoming the most popular sporting event, even outside the Olympics. Here is the info on World Cup History or World Cup history from start to now from 1930 to today.

![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)

# World Cup history

Long before the first World Cup was held in 1930, the first international football match was held in 1872. At that time England met with Scotland. Football also became popular around the world when entering the year 1900. Many national teams from countries other than England began to take shape. FIFA was then formed on May 22, 1904 as an international football authority.
The popularity of football makes this sport start on the Olympic agenda. Yes, football became one of the official sports in the biggest sports event, the Olympics. Although FIFA has planned to make an international tournament outside the Olympics, but it can not be realized.
In 1914, FIFA also agreed to organize a football tournament at the Olympics. Starting the 1920 Olympics, soccer sport became an unofficial international soccer tournament. Belgium became the champion in 1920, while Uruguay won the Olympic gold medal in 1924 and 1928.
FIFA then decided to organize a soccer tournament of its own. This is related to the decision of the IOC, the Olympic organizer to eliminate the sport of football at the 1932 Olympics in the United States, due to the low popularity of football in America. FIFA president at the time, Jules Rimet immediately set up a new competition system given the FIFA World Cup or FIFA World Cup.

<center>![s1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQYmhsTkYbCgvtk7yATQi8qKxpZjk3LNxrHjXxy9NKqAX/s1.jpg)</center>
# World Cup First
Uruguay was named host of the first World Cup tournament in 1930, as an unofficial world champion to win two golds in the last two Olympics. Despite the problems, mainly because of transport by some European countries did not participate, but eventually the first World Cup event was held. Uruguay came out as champions by beating Argentina in the final round. The 1930 World Cup was followed by 13 contestant teams.
Furthermore, FIFA holds this tournament every four years. Each FIFA member country team, now numbering more than 200 countries, can participate through the qualifying round. To date, the World Cup has become one of the most popular international football tournaments. Leading countries such as Brazil, Italy, Germany, Argentina or Uruguay have become world champions more than once.
World Cup Winner List
Who are the countries that have won the World Cup from before until now? Here is a list of World Cup champions from year to year starting from the 1930 World Cup to the 2018 World Cup which is currently the latest full update.

> >  1930: Uruguay
1934: Italy
 1938: Italy
 1950: Uruguay
1954: West Germany
1958: Brazil
 1962: Brazil
 1966: England
1970: Brazil
 1974: West Germany
 1978: Argentina
1982: Italy
1986: Argentina
1990: West Germany
1994: Brazil
1998: France
 2002: Brazil
 2006: Italy
 2010: Spain
 2014: Germany
 2018:?


Well that's the info about the history of the World Cup from the first until now. The start of the World Cup took place in 1930 where Uruguay came out as champions. Meanwhile, until now the Brazilian national team into a World Cup winning team with a total of 5 titles. To ensure the World Cup remains the most popular and most prestigious soccer event in the world.

author: saifulanwar
body:
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)
Lionel Messi mentions there are eight players who he believes will shine in the 2018 World Cup. From the list there is no name rival in the Spanish League, Cristiano Ronaldo.

Messi will pursue his first World Cup title with Argentina in the tournament in Russia later. At the age of 30, this opportunity is mentioned as the last one for the Barcelona player.

![b4.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcM9bBkWqXcWxXnKHhUr6kzcnQwhN7U58TtNb5ByRUf6A/b4.png)

Messi assess the competition in the final round will be tight. He also saw a number of players will appear more prominent than the others.

He mentioned a number of names that are considered to be shining. "Brazil has Ney (Neymar) and Philippe (Coutinho)," he told El Mundo Deportivo.

He added: "Spain has Andres Iniesta and (David) Silva. Germany does not have stars, but they are very solid."

<center>![messi.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXYjheZhQim3gqjopvopeYUoUc9bdrVBQaMy9ZYD9U8Ua/messi.jpg)</center>

The other star he sees is the Belgian team. "Belgium has (Eden) Hazard and (Kevin) De Bruyne, France owns (Antoine) Griezmann and (Kylian) Mbappe," he said. "This tournament is full of very good players."

Whether intentionally or forgetfully, Messi did not mention Ronaldo, a Portuguese player who has always been his main rival in the hunt for the world's best player title.

In the final round later, Messi and Ronaldo are in a different group. Messi and Argentina will play in Group D alongside Iceland, Croatia and Nigeria. While Ronaldo and Portugal will play in group B along with Spain, Morocco, also Iran.

author: anak123
body:
<center>![20.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb6Tb4NB5W8kdsAMWg3Q95dfPoAZbDSdrL6cn31qysuum/20.jpg)</center>
Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo have dominated world football in the past 10 years. Both won the world's best player title five times. Now both are starting to get out of the way - Ronaldo and Messi are 30 years old - 30 years old - although their looks have not shown any signs of sagging.

Who's the second successor? According to the football world governing body (FIFA) report, there are at least five names worth mentioning:

<center>![21.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZkEXMVoCdKv5CuFRihP7vdVWgLYCSfpwjBj7pQCachdg/21.jpg)</center>
<center> Neymar (Brasil)</center>
He is a classy striker who holds the status of the most expensive player in the world. Even so the backbone of Barcelona, now peddling the Paris Saint-Germain front line. Later he is also rumored to be joining Real Madrid, the club Ronaldo.

He is only 26 years old so has the opportunity to enjoy kemashuran as the most prominent players when Messi and Ronaldo began to fade. He has a complete capital: basketball grinder, game reading intelligence, and exceptional final resolution capabilities. He is now a mainstay Brazilian who fought for World Cup champion 2018.


<center>![22.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQRg9NydfqdRvbeTDzwsAWfhumSBmYyyfAc4g4sxWeW8B/22.jpg)</center>
<center>Mohamed Salah (Mesir)</center>
His name did not sound much last season. But, this season, Mohamed Salah darts like a meteor. The 28-year-old has donated 44 goals for Liverpool, bringing the team through to the Champions League next season and reaching the Champions League final this season. In that last game too - when Liverpool beat Real Madrid - he suffered a shoulder injury. Now the winger is still racing to recover in order to strengthen Egypt in the 2018 World Cup.


<center>![23.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYUXKkraWBBiKG1whMmNgvwJKfAxT1fe2TKaXdqsvf6Dc/23.jpg)</center>
<center>Kevin de Bruyne (Belgia)</center>
This season, Kevin de Bruyne won the ass kings title from another Belgian player, Eden Hazard. Donations assist him to lead Manchester City into English Premier League champions. If he can lead Belgium to the 2018 World Cup champions, De Bruyne could be on the shortlist of the world's best players of the year, rivaling Ronaldo and Messi.

<center>![24.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdhQgebwvF6RHkPN8gX9TvtK1MgwJ4MmDhqiwUB2cVHvm/24.jpg)</center>
<center>Harry Kane (Inggris)</center>

Harry Kane is maturing at the age of 24 years. He is a hard worker in the field, has a tremendous instinct in finding space and time to score goals. He is a mainstay of Tottenham and England national team. In the national team he has even been believed to be a captain. After Messi and Ronaldo decline, Kane is likely to become Neymar's top competitor in the title race of the world's best players. Especially if he can move to a club that is more likely champion at the level of domestic and Europe.

<center>![25.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRB8SD7gTTQA9US9av79syvZDLmvjRtJv7mhvz3VngcDL/25.jpg)</center>
<center>Kylian Mbappe (Prancis)</center>

In the age of 19 years, he was able to compete with another big name. At a young age he was able to show his maturity in scoring goals, in Monaco last season and now at PSG. The 2018 World Cup could be the perfect stage for him in displaying his brilliance with France.

author: wr212
body:
<center>![16.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeNEaviaXggGSCZeHKvsATzWKh1nNMXHpYLVqhxhWUepD/16.jpg)</center>

Real Madrid reportedly submitted a new contract for striker Cristiano Ronaldo. However, the offer of Real Madrid is considered not satisfy the mega star.
Madrid called the new contract for a fee of 28.5 million pounds, or about Rp 529.7 billion per year. But the value is still below the salary of his arch-enemy, Lionel Messi, who paid from Barcelona for 31.2 million pounds, or about Rp 579.9 billion per year.
According to Spanish journalist Manolo Lama, Real Madrid also split Ronaldo's salary. A total of 22 million pounds is a basic salary while 6.5 million pounds in the form of bonuses if he won the Champions League, Spanish League, Copa del Rey and so forth.

<center>![6.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmS5VFKp5syQSBuejkN2tfRpQqZe8zFfaMRK4KDDinVoER/6.jpg)</center>

Real Madrid's offer did not fully satisfy Ronaldo. He considers himself worth more than Messi who is currently the highest paid footballer in the world.
Therefore, there is no news that Cristiano Ronaldo will soon sign a new contract at Real Madrid. The process of negotiation between the two sides is called sustainable. But Ronaldo mentioned will soon take decisions after the 2018 World Cup.

author: anak123
body:
<center>![29.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTDJQ8ttCPB1nD5i26cF6BbvVR4H7bX4ti5bqNo27m9YU/29.jpg)</center>

Barcelona star Lionel Messi explicitly exposed the tax cases that ensnare him in Spain. He accused Real Madrid of being behind the rise of the case.
In an interview with Spanish media Sport, Messi mentioned that the last few seasons are very difficult for him. The reason he got a massive attack from the Spanish tax authorities. He also accused Real Madrid of being behind the attack.

<center>![20.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb6Tb4NB5W8kdsAMWg3Q95dfPoAZbDSdrL6cn31qysuum/20.jpg)</center>

"I've been through tough times, like everything related to the tax office, it's very difficult because of the way they attacked me and talked about me, my family, my father and the people behind me," he said.
"I felt the attack came from Real Madri and it was very difficult, I felt really diseratng but I was lucky to have the support of those close to me, Barcelona, ​​Catalunya and journalists here.That makes me a little more calm, he continued.
Lionel Messi is accused of not reporting his earnings of 10.2 million euros from the sale of his image rights in 2007 to 2009 then. Of that value, he called not paying 4.1 million euros taxes to the Spanish tax service.
Not only Lionel Messi, his father, Jorge Horacio Messi, was also accused of being involved in the case. Barcelona court finally convicted on Messi in June 2016 ago. His attempts to file an appeal until the appeal failed after the Spanish Supreme Court upheld the court's decision.
Lionel Messi's allegations to Real Madrid are quite plausible because after his case rolled out, a number of other Barcelona players were involved in a tax-hooked case. Defender Javier Mascherano, Dani Alves, to Neymar Jr. there are among them.
But recently a number of Real Madrid players are also involved in tax cases. Cristiano Ronaldo, Luka Modric, until Xabi Alonso was caught in the same case.

Messi and Neymar valued US $ 215 million or nearly Rp 3 trillion. They are both placed in the first rank.
Under the two players are Egypt striker Mohamed Salah, Harry Kane of England, and Kevin De Bruyne from Belgium.
The scores of three players defending Liverpool, Tottenham Hotspur and Manchester City are around US $ 179 million or nearly Rp 2.5 trillion.

author: wr212
body:
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)
Кожні чотири роки є група гравців, які не виняток. Кубок світу є найкращим місцем, щоб показати свою майстерність гравця, щоб отримати кращий контракт з їх поточної командою, щоб привернути увагу до HeadHunter або просто підняти ціни на ринку, але це подія, безумовно, кращий шанс для гравців, щоб виділитися. серед натовпу.
Одна річ, щоб бути кращим гравцем в національній лізі, в якій налічується понад 30 ігор в рік, щоб отримати хорошу форму, знайти кращий рівень, розуміння ваших товаришів по команді і повністю зрозуміти команду геймплей. Це ще одна річ, яка повністю відрізняється від грати в турнірі, де у вас є тільки 3 гри, щоб зробити їх краще, finjo Mojo вас і викластися бій, щоб досягти наступного раунду, де поганий день може означати того, щоб повернутися додому, замість вийшов на сцену нокауту.

У Кубку світу, гравці стикаються з жорстким випробуванням в їхньому житті, де всі свої таланти і навички випробуваного, але те, що відрізняє хороших гравців від великих гравців менталітет і ставлення до гри, в певному напрямку. ситуацій, коли вони стикаються з негативними цінностями ... У світі чаші розуму так само важливо, як і тіло, тому ми вирішили навести список гравців, які, на нашу думку, мають тіло і розум, які дозволять їм керувати ними. команда до перемоги. Покладіться на своїх товаришів по команді, виконання команди дуже залежить від продуктивності гравця.

author: anak123
body:
<center>![piala dunia.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVFjQ7hnd4mpn4k4nL9P5H5aJxvLYvF9quAvyVJUmmkxU/piala%20dunia.jpg)</center>
<center>[](https://pialadunia.tempo.co/read/1051773/kisah-piala-dunia-pertama-1930-sejarah-bermula-di-montevideo)</center>
The 32 best teams in the world will compete for the best in the 2018 World Cup, to be held in Russia from 14 June to 15 July. It will be the 21st edition of the world's biggest football competition.World Cup history has stretched long, since 1930. At that time football has been contested at the Olympics since 1920 and won by Belgium. Uruguay then won the next two editions, namely in 1924 and 1928.
The success of the Olympic football tournament spurred the hope of world football's governing body (FlFA) to be able to hold its own world championship. The questionnaire is then sent to the members association, asking if they agree to organize the tournament.A special committee was formed for election purposes. FIFA President Jules Rimet became the driving force. He is assisted by the tireless secretary general, Henri Delaunay.The FIFA Congress in Amsterdam on May 28, 1928 finally decided to organize a world championship organized by FIFA. Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Spain and Sweden volunteered to host.
Uruguay finally elected. The country is considered eligible to host the Olympic champion twice and is currently celebrating the 100th anniversary of independence. Uruguay is also willing to bear all costs, including travel and accommodation from participating teams.The first World Cup was full of thorns and thorns. Europe is in the midst of an economic crisis. Participating countries only involve long sea travel, many clubs also object to releasing their best players for two months.
As a result, many countries decide to cancel. Rimet also has to do a lot of maneuvers to make sure there are at least four European teams - France, Belgium, Romania, and Yugoslavia - still performing.Thirteen teams (seven from South America, four from Europe, and two from North America) participated in the tournament. The first World Cup opened at the new Estadio Centenario in Montevideo on July 18, 1930. The tournament was held in three cities.
The participating teams were then divided into four groups, with the winners from each group progressing to the semi-finals. The first two World Cup matches took place simultaneously, and were won by France and the United States, which beat Mexico 4-1 and Belgium 3-0.France's Lucien Laurent scored the first goal in World Cup history. While American goalkeeper Jimmy Douglas recorded the first clean sheet (not conceded) in the tournament.
Argentina, Uruguay, the United States and Yugoslavia won their respective groups and managed to qualify for the semi-finals. In the final, Uruguay meet Argentina. The favored Uruguayan host at the start finally won with a 4-2 win. The last match in Centenario, Montevideo, witnessed 93 thousand.
The first World Cup was a success, but Uruguay were disappointed as there were only four European teams participating. Anger in Montevideo was so great that four years later, when Italy hosted, Uruguay became the first and only defending champion to refuse to defend the title.In 1930 World Cup Guillermo Stabile from Argentina was the top scorer, with a collection of 8 goals. In 18 games it created a total of 70 goals. While the total audience reached 590 thousand or an average of 32 thousand per game.

author: saifulanwar
body:
Есть более 1200 записей от 1200 различных людей из Стемиана, и у вас есть еще одна неделя, чтобы представить свои записи!
-----------------------------------------------

Это может быть конкурс с большим количеством участников истории Стемита ... насколько это здорово?
-------------------------------------------------
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)

Предыдущее сообщение было оплачено и больше не может быть выкуплено. Потому что мы хотим, чтобы EVERYONE в Steemit присоединился к этому конкурсу, и одно из правил присоединиться к кубку @blocktrades - выкупить объявление, мы решили сделать новое объявление.
ЕСЛИ ВЫ ХОТИТЕ ПРИСОЕДИНЯТЬСЯ НА ЭТОТ КОНКУРС, ВЫ НЕ ДОЛЖНЫ ПРИНИМАТЬ ПРЕДЫДУЩИЙ ПОЧТА, ВЫ МОЖЕТЕ ПРОИЗВОДИТЬ ЭТО ОДИН.

@blocktrades любит спонсировать проекты взаимодействия с сообществом этого типа, и @anomadsoul & @acidyo знают, что многие из Steemian любят эту игру, поэтому мы решили провести этот грандиозный турнир по футболу.

Вам не обязательно быть профессиональным аналитиком игры, ваша сборная не должна участвовать, вам не нужно много знать о футболе, чтобы присоединиться ...

Все, что вам нужно сделать, это написать сообщение, набирающее каждого победителя матча, и Стемеан, который делает больше очков, выигрывает.

Так просто, как
Привет @anomadsoul, я хочу часть 2000 SBD, как я могу присоединиться?
Это легко: в мировом кубке есть два этапа: Stage Stage и Stage Knockout.

Для этого этапа группового этапа кубка @blocktrades все, что вам нужно сделать, это создать сообщение с предсказаниями матча в каждой из следующих игр. Имена команд должны быть на английском языке:
Вы должны сделать сообщение с вашим прогнозом. В этом посте вы должны использовать W (чтобы выиграть), L (проиграть) и T (для привязки) в каждой игре.

ВЫ ДОЛЖНЫ ИСПОЛЬЗОВАТЬ ЭТОТ ШАБЛОН, ЧТОБЫ ПРИСОЕДИНЯТЬСЯ К КОНКУРУ. ЩЕЛКНИТЕ ЗДЕСЬ, ЧТОБЫ ПОЛУЧИТЬ ШАБЛОН
Эй, @anomadsoul, есть правило?

Да, есть несколько простых правил:
ПРАВИЛА
1 - Название вашего сообщения должно быть: The @blocktrades World Cup | Мой выбор

2 - В вашем сообщении вы должны указать ссылку на это объявление.

3 - Используйте формат, указанный в ссылке выше, чтобы мы могли организовать каждую запись.

4- Используйте теги blocktradesworldcup и теги mypicks

5 - Восстановить сообщение. Мы хотим иметь сотни записей.

6 - После создания сообщения вы не можете его редактировать. Поэтому, пожалуйста, подумайте о своем выборе тщательно перед публикацией.

7 - Минимальная репутация для участия - 40. Это делается для того, чтобы не присоединяться к ботам.}

8 - Вы можете подать заявку до 14 июня 2018 года в 00:01, часовой пояс UTC.

Печать: для каждого правильного пикапа, который вы делаете на групповом этапе, вам будет присвоен один (1) балл. В конце кубка приз будет разделен между главными голами состязателей. Предполагаемое количество участников войны будет зависеть от количества записей, которые мы получаем.
Привет @blocktrades, а как насчет второго этапа Кубка, нокаутом?

Групповой этап завершился 28 июня (русское время) и этап нокаута начинается 30 июня. Поэтому после 28 июня мы объявим об этом аккаунте, чтобы вы знали, как работает этап нокаута.

Каждый человек может участвовать в обоих этапах, и победитель будет определяться количеством баллов с обеих этапов.
Попробуйте и пусть начнутся предсказания!

Это конкурс спонсоров на @blocktrades, если вам нравится, что он делает, проголосуйте за @blocktrades в качестве свидетеля [здесь](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

Это конкурс @acidyo & @anomadsoul, проголосовавший за @ ocd-witness в качестве свидетеля [здесь](https://steemit.com/wwitnesses)

body:
![b4.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcM9bBkWqXcWxXnKHhUr6kzcnQwhN7U58TtNb5ByRUf6A/b4.png)

The World Cup is the largest international football event in the world. The tournament is held every four years and is hosted by FIFA as the world's tallest footballing body. The FIFA World Cup has the official name of the FIFA World Cup. Each country participates through the qualification stage to the final to win the world championship trophy. But this tournament has a long history of becoming the most popular sporting event, even outside the Olympics. Here is the info on World Cup History or World Cup history from start to now from 1930 to today.

![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)

# World Cup history

Long before the first World Cup was held in 1930, the first international football match was held in 1872. At that time England met with Scotland. Football also became popular around the world when entering the year 1900. Many national teams from countries other than England began to take shape. FIFA was then formed on May 22, 1904 as an international football authority.
The popularity of football makes this sport start on the Olympic agenda. Yes, football became one of the official sports in the biggest sports event, the Olympics. Although FIFA has planned to make an international tournament outside the Olympics, but it can not be realized.
In 1914, FIFA also agreed to organize a football tournament at the Olympics. Starting the 1920 Olympics, soccer sport became an unofficial international soccer tournament. Belgium became the champion in 1920, while Uruguay won the Olympic gold medal in 1924 and 1928.
FIFA then decided to organize a soccer tournament of its own. This is related to the decision of the IOC, the Olympic organizer to eliminate the sport of football at the 1932 Olympics in the United States, due to the low popularity of football in America. FIFA president at the time, Jules Rimet immediately set up a new competition system given the FIFA World Cup or FIFA World Cup.

<center>![s1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQYmhsTkYbCgvtk7yATQi8qKxpZjk3LNxrHjXxy9NKqAX/s1.jpg)</center>
# World Cup First
Uruguay was named host of the first World Cup tournament in 1930, as an unofficial world champion to win two golds in the last two Olympics. Despite the problems, mainly because of transport by some European countries did not participate, but eventually the first World Cup event was held. Uruguay came out as champions by beating Argentina in the final round. The 1930 World Cup was followed by 13 contestant teams.
Furthermore, FIFA holds this tournament every four years. Each FIFA member country team, now numbering more than 200 countries, can participate through the qualifying round. To date, the World Cup has become one of the most popular international football tournaments. Leading countries such as Brazil, Italy, Germany, Argentina or Uruguay have become world champions more than once.
World Cup Winner List
Who are the countries that have won the World Cup from before until now? Here is a list of World Cup champions from year to year starting from the 1930 World Cup to the 2018 World Cup which is currently the latest full update.

> >  1930: Uruguay
1934: Italy
 1938: Italy
 1950: Uruguay
1954: West Germany
1958: Brazil
 1962: Brazil
 1966: England
1970: Brazil
 1974: West Germany
 1978: Argentina
1982: Italy
1986: Argentina
1990: West Germany
1994: Brazil
1998: France
 2002: Brazil
 2006: Italy
 2010: Spain
 2014: Germany
 2018:?


Well that's the info about the history of the World Cup from the first until now. The start of the World Cup took place in 1930 where Uruguay came out as champions. Meanwhile, until now the Brazilian national team into a World Cup winning team with a total of 5 titles. To ensure the World Cup remains the most popular and most prestigious soccer event in the world.

author: saifulanwar
body:
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)
Lionel Messi mentions there are eight players who he believes will shine in the 2018 World Cup. From the list there is no name rival in the Spanish League, Cristiano Ronaldo.

Messi will pursue his first World Cup title with Argentina in the tournament in Russia later. At the age of 30, this opportunity is mentioned as the last one for the Barcelona player.

![b4.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcM9bBkWqXcWxXnKHhUr6kzcnQwhN7U58TtNb5ByRUf6A/b4.png)

Messi assess the competition in the final round will be tight. He also saw a number of players will appear more prominent than the others.

He mentioned a number of names that are considered to be shining. "Brazil has Ney (Neymar) and Philippe (Coutinho)," he told El Mundo Deportivo.

He added: "Spain has Andres Iniesta and (David) Silva. Germany does not have stars, but they are very solid."

<center>![messi.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXYjheZhQim3gqjopvopeYUoUc9bdrVBQaMy9ZYD9U8Ua/messi.jpg)</center>

The other star he sees is the Belgian team. "Belgium has (Eden) Hazard and (Kevin) De Bruyne, France owns (Antoine) Griezmann and (Kylian) Mbappe," he said. "This tournament is full of very good players."

Whether intentionally or forgetfully, Messi did not mention Ronaldo, a Portuguese player who has always been his main rival in the hunt for the world's best player title.

In the final round later, Messi and Ronaldo are in a different group. Messi and Argentina will play in Group D alongside Iceland, Croatia and Nigeria. While Ronaldo and Portugal will play in group B along with Spain, Morocco, also Iran.

author: anak123
body:
<center>![20.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb6Tb4NB5W8kdsAMWg3Q95dfPoAZbDSdrL6cn31qysuum/20.jpg)</center>
Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo have dominated world football in the past 10 years. Both won the world's best player title five times. Now both are starting to get out of the way - Ronaldo and Messi are 30 years old - 30 years old - although their looks have not shown any signs of sagging.

Who's the second successor? According to the football world governing body (FIFA) report, there are at least five names worth mentioning:

<center>![21.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZkEXMVoCdKv5CuFRihP7vdVWgLYCSfpwjBj7pQCachdg/21.jpg)</center>
<center> Neymar (Brasil)</center>
He is a classy striker who holds the status of the most expensive player in the world. Even so the backbone of Barcelona, now peddling the Paris Saint-Germain front line. Later he is also rumored to be joining Real Madrid, the club Ronaldo.

He is only 26 years old so has the opportunity to enjoy kemashuran as the most prominent players when Messi and Ronaldo began to fade. He has a complete capital: basketball grinder, game reading intelligence, and exceptional final resolution capabilities. He is now a mainstay Brazilian who fought for World Cup champion 2018.


<center>![22.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQRg9NydfqdRvbeTDzwsAWfhumSBmYyyfAc4g4sxWeW8B/22.jpg)</center>
<center>Mohamed Salah (Mesir)</center>
His name did not sound much last season. But, this season, Mohamed Salah darts like a meteor. The 28-year-old has donated 44 goals for Liverpool, bringing the team through to the Champions League next season and reaching the Champions League final this season. In that last game too - when Liverpool beat Real Madrid - he suffered a shoulder injury. Now the winger is still racing to recover in order to strengthen Egypt in the 2018 World Cup.


<center>![23.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYUXKkraWBBiKG1whMmNgvwJKfAxT1fe2TKaXdqsvf6Dc/23.jpg)</center>
<center>Kevin de Bruyne (Belgia)</center>
This season, Kevin de Bruyne won the ass kings title from another Belgian player, Eden Hazard. Donations assist him to lead Manchester City into English Premier League champions. If he can lead Belgium to the 2018 World Cup champions, De Bruyne could be on the shortlist of the world's best players of the year, rivaling Ronaldo and Messi.

<center>![24.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdhQgebwvF6RHkPN8gX9TvtK1MgwJ4MmDhqiwUB2cVHvm/24.jpg)</center>
<center>Harry Kane (Inggris)</center>

Harry Kane is maturing at the age of 24 years. He is a hard worker in the field, has a tremendous instinct in finding space and time to score goals. He is a mainstay of Tottenham and England national team. In the national team he has even been believed to be a captain. After Messi and Ronaldo decline, Kane is likely to become Neymar's top competitor in the title race of the world's best players. Especially if he can move to a club that is more likely champion at the level of domestic and Europe.

<center>![25.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRB8SD7gTTQA9US9av79syvZDLmvjRtJv7mhvz3VngcDL/25.jpg)</center>
<center>Kylian Mbappe (Prancis)</center>

In the age of 19 years, he was able to compete with another big name. At a young age he was able to show his maturity in scoring goals, in Monaco last season and now at PSG. The 2018 World Cup could be the perfect stage for him in displaying his brilliance with France.

author: wr212
body:
<center>![16.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeNEaviaXggGSCZeHKvsATzWKh1nNMXHpYLVqhxhWUepD/16.jpg)</center>

Real Madrid reportedly submitted a new contract for striker Cristiano Ronaldo. However, the offer of Real Madrid is considered not satisfy the mega star.
Madrid called the new contract for a fee of 28.5 million pounds, or about Rp 529.7 billion per year. But the value is still below the salary of his arch-enemy, Lionel Messi, who paid from Barcelona for 31.2 million pounds, or about Rp 579.9 billion per year.
According to Spanish journalist Manolo Lama, Real Madrid also split Ronaldo's salary. A total of 22 million pounds is a basic salary while 6.5 million pounds in the form of bonuses if he won the Champions League, Spanish League, Copa del Rey and so forth.

<center>![6.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmS5VFKp5syQSBuejkN2tfRpQqZe8zFfaMRK4KDDinVoER/6.jpg)</center>

Real Madrid's offer did not fully satisfy Ronaldo. He considers himself worth more than Messi who is currently the highest paid footballer in the world.
Therefore, there is no news that Cristiano Ronaldo will soon sign a new contract at Real Madrid. The process of negotiation between the two sides is called sustainable. But Ronaldo mentioned will soon take decisions after the 2018 World Cup.

author: anak123
body:
<center>![29.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTDJQ8ttCPB1nD5i26cF6BbvVR4H7bX4ti5bqNo27m9YU/29.jpg)</center>

Barcelona star Lionel Messi explicitly exposed the tax cases that ensnare him in Spain. He accused Real Madrid of being behind the rise of the case.
In an interview with Spanish media Sport, Messi mentioned that the last few seasons are very difficult for him. The reason he got a massive attack from the Spanish tax authorities. He also accused Real Madrid of being behind the attack.

<center>![20.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb6Tb4NB5W8kdsAMWg3Q95dfPoAZbDSdrL6cn31qysuum/20.jpg)</center>

"I've been through tough times, like everything related to the tax office, it's very difficult because of the way they attacked me and talked about me, my family, my father and the people behind me," he said.
"I felt the attack came from Real Madri and it was very difficult, I felt really diseratng but I was lucky to have the support of those close to me, Barcelona, ​​Catalunya and journalists here.That makes me a little more calm, he continued.
Lionel Messi is accused of not reporting his earnings of 10.2 million euros from the sale of his image rights in 2007 to 2009 then. Of that value, he called not paying 4.1 million euros taxes to the Spanish tax service.
Not only Lionel Messi, his father, Jorge Horacio Messi, was also accused of being involved in the case. Barcelona court finally convicted on Messi in June 2016 ago. His attempts to file an appeal until the appeal failed after the Spanish Supreme Court upheld the court's decision.
Lionel Messi's allegations to Real Madrid are quite plausible because after his case rolled out, a number of other Barcelona players were involved in a tax-hooked case. Defender Javier Mascherano, Dani Alves, to Neymar Jr. there are among them.
But recently a number of Real Madrid players are also involved in tax cases. Cristiano Ronaldo, Luka Modric, until Xabi Alonso was caught in the same case.

Lionel Messi and Neymar recorded as the most expensive players from the ranks of 12 players with the highest score in the 2018 World Cup.

Messi and Neymar valued US $ 215 million or nearly Rp 3 trillion. They are both placed in the first rank.
Under the two players are Egypt striker Mohamed Salah, Harry Kane of England, and Kevin De Bruyne from Belgium.
The scores of three players defending Liverpool, Tottenham Hotspur and Manchester City are around US $ 179 million or nearly Rp 2.5 trillion.
